TextinsDialog Class Reference

#include <textinsdlg.h>

List of all members.

Public Methods

void SetHeight (double the_height)
 param: the_height: a string which contains a given heightvalue.

void SetUnit (const wxString &buf)
 param: buf: a string which temporary contains a given unitsetting.

Detailed Description

c_des: Class TextinsDialog. c_des: This class is used in the class TextTool to show an edit-/inserttext dialog in which c_des: a textvalue, a textheight and unitsetting can be given or edited. rel_type: class: TextTool
